The Next Frontier in Wealth Advisory

Why SCFP-HNWI?

Position yourself as Singapore's go-to specialist for ultra-high-net-worth individuals, family businesses, and multi-generational wealth planning.

Serve Singapore's Wealthiest

Position yourself to advise ultra-high-net-worth individuals, family businesses, and business dynasties with confidence and expertise.

Command Premium Fees

HNWI advisory commands significantly higher compensation. Specialists earn 40-60% more than generalist advisors.

Exclusive Positioning

Join an elite group of certified HNWI specialists. Stand out in Singapore's competitive wealth management landscape.

Family Business Opportunities

Gain expertise to work with family business owners, and private wealth advisory boutiques.

Complex Problem Solving

Master sophisticated strategies for wealth structuring, succession planning, and multi-generational advisory that few advisors can offer.

Network with Elite Peers

Learn alongside and build relationships with Singapore's top wealth advisors serving the most sophisticated clients.

What Makes This Program Different

Specialised HNWI program contextualized for financial advisers
Dual certification: HNWI and Family-Owned Businesses™ Certification + IBF-Advanced (Level II) Certification
Learn from practitioners with actual experience planning for HNWI
Real-world case studies from actual family business clients
Small cohort sizes for personalized attention and networking
Access to exclusive HNWI advisor community and alumni events

Designed for Elite Advisors

This advanced certification is exclusively for experienced financial professionals ready to master the complexities of high-net-worth and family business advisory. If you're a CFP® professional, private banker, or wealth manager serving affluent clients, this program will elevate your practice to the next level.

CFP® ProfessionalsPrivate BankersWealth ManagersFamily Business Advisors
SCFP-HNWI Certification Modules

Advanced Curriculum

Seven specialized modules covering the complete spectrum of HNWI and family business advisory. Five core modules plus one elective of your choice.

Core Modules (Required)

Module 1CORE

Segmentation & Targeting for Effective Positioning & Propositions

Create Personal Brand & Value Positioning for HNWI Segment

This module provides learners with a comprehensive understanding and action plan to develop personal branding, and effectively segment and target potential customers in the HNWI and Family-owned Business segment.

2 Days
In-Person Masterclass

Key Topics Include:

  • •Personal Branding & Market Segmentation
  • •Value Proposition Development
  • + more topics
View Module Details
Module 2CORE

Strategies for Advising High-Net-Worth Individuals

Master HNWI Advisory & Relationship Building

Building and maintaining relationships with HNWIs and Family-owned Businesses is both an art and a science. This module equips learners with the tools, insights, and strategies necessary to attract, engage, and advise affluent clients effectively.

1 Day
In-Person Masterclass

Key Topics Include:

  • •Understanding HNWI Psychology
  • •Product Knowledge & Suitability
  • + more topics
View Module Details
Module 3CORE

Products Propositions and Structures for Wealthy Individuals

Bespoke Wealth Management Structures & Solutions

Designed for advisors serving HNWIs and Family-owned businesses, this module provides in-depth understanding of wealth management strategies and product structuring of bespoke financial solutions that address the unique needs of these clients.

2 Days
In-Person Masterclass

Key Topics Include:

  • •Advanced Product Structures
  • •Trust & Estate Structures
  • + more topics
View Module Details
Module 4CORE

Financial Planning for SME Businesses

Specialized Financial Planning for SMEs & Family Businesses

SMEs and Family-owned businesses are the backbone of Singapore's economy. This module equips learners with skills and knowledge to effectively identify and address financial challenges and provide bespoke financial solutions for SME clients.

2 Days
In-Person Masterclass

Key Topics Include:

  • •Corporate Financial Analysis
  • •Risk Management & Protection
  • + more topics
View Module Details
Module 5CORE

Customer Onboarding & Ethical Culture in Financial Advisory (E-Learning)

Ethics, Compliance & Professional Standards for HNWI Advisory

The financial advisory profession demands more than technical knowledge; it requires unwavering ethical practices and leadership. This module transforms compliance obligations into competitive advantage, giving learners a framework to excel where regulations and ethics meet everyday practice.

Asynchronous E-Learning
E-Learning

Key Topics Include:

  • •Customer Onboarding & AML
  • •Counter-Terrorism & Financial Crime
  • + more topics
View Module Details

Elective Modules (Choose One)

Select one elective module that aligns with your practice focus and target clientele.

Module 6AELECTIVE

Financial Planning for Gig Economy Workers in Singapore

Elective: Specialized Planning for Non-Traditional Income

The gig economy comprises many potential client segments by income, from low-income platform workers to high-income freelance consultants. This module equips learners with knowledge and competencies to navigate complexities of financial planning for gig economy workers.

2 Days
In-Person Masterclass

Key Topics Include:

  • •Gig Economy Landscape
  • •Financial Planning for Variable Income
  • + more topics
View Module Details
Module 6BELECTIVE

Retirement Planning for High-Net-Worth Individuals and Business Owners

Elective: Advanced Retirement & Exit Planning for HNWIs

This rigorous, industry-focused program equips learners with advanced knowledge and competencies to address retirement challenges of HNWIs and Family-owned businesses, incorporating practical application for exceptional advisory services.

2 Days
In-Person Masterclass

Key Topics Include:

  • •HNWI Retirement Framework
  • •Estate Planning in Retirement
  • + more topics
View Module Details
Register Interest for Full Program

Exclusive Program

Who Should Enrol?

This Program is suitable for licensed representatives working as Financial Planners, Insurance Agents and Bancassurance Specialists seeking highly rewarding career opportunities in the HNWIs and Family-Owned Business segment. Learners will differentiate themselves amongst competitors as a specialist certified professional in the Financial Services industry. Existing practitioners looking to advance their career opportunities will find the Program a significant boost to their career breakthrough.

Financial Planners

Licensed representatives looking to differentiate themselves amongst competitors as a specialist certified professional.

Seeking competitive differentiation
Desire for specialization

Agents seeking highly rewarding career opportunities in the HNWIs and Family-Owned Business segment.

Funding Support

This Program has been accredited under the Skills Framework for Financial Services and is eligible for funding under the IBF Standards Training Scheme (IBF-STS), subject to all eligibility criteria being met.

Participants are advised to assess the suitability of the course and its relevance to his/her business activities or job roles.

The IBF-STS is available to eligible entities and individuals based on the prevalent funding eligibility, quantum and caps. IBF-STS provides up to 70% course fee subsidy support for direct training costs subject to a cap of S$3,000 per candidate per course subject to all eligibility criteria being met.

Find out more on www.ibf.org.sg

What's Included in Your Investment

All module materials
In-person masterclasses with expert faculty
E-learning platform access
Real-world case studies and materials
Dual certification upon completion
Access to elite advisor network
Lifetime alumni community membership
